name: com.teamcitrus.open-with-menu-items
description:
Extendable menu items that open files in external applications.
Examples:
 ▪ Notepad++: https://github.com/david-sigaty/open-with-npp
 ▪ Photoshop: https://github.com/david-sigaty/open-with-ps
 ▪ GIMP: https://github.com/david-sigaty/open-with-gimp
